        <description/>
        <name>MSTeamsConversationContext</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var MSTeamsConversationContext = Class.create();
MSTeamsConversationContext.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
		this.COMPRESSEDDATA2 = 'COMPRESSEDDATA2:';
    },
	
	getConversationContext: function(conversationId) {
		var conversationGr = new GlideRecord('sys_cs_conversation');
		if(conversationGr.get(conversationId)) {
			var context = this.getDecompressedValue(conversationGr, 'context');
			var payload = this.getPayload(context);
			return payload;
		}
		return;
	},
	
	getDecompressedValue: function(gr, fieldName) {
		var fValue = gr.getValue(fieldName);
		var s = fValue.substring(this.COMPRESSEDDATA2.length);
		var b = GlideStringUtil.base64DecodeAsBytes(s);
		if(!gs.nil(b)) {
			try {
				var x = GlideCompressionUtil.expandToString(b);
				return x;
			} catch(e) {
				gs.error("Error in decompressing the value " + e.getMessage());
			}	
		}
		return;
	},

	getPayload: function(context) {
		var xmlDoc = new XMLDocument2();
		xmlDoc.parseXML(context);
		var node = xmlDoc.getNode("//entry[string='_topic_last_custom_adapter_message_payload']//value");
		if(!gs.nil(node)) {
			return node.getTextContent();
		}
		return;
	},
	
    type: 'MSTeamsConversationContext'
};]]></script>
